attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to scrap the proposed introduction of ID cards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of ID cards will not prevent terrorism or crime, as is claimed. It will be yet another indirect tax on all law-abiding citizens of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
